intro_subtitle: Nestled in the heart of Mount Kozara, our resort offers an unforgettable experience where every detail reflects warmth, care, and elegance.
offer_desc: Prices have been temporarily reduced because final exterior landscaping and finishing touches are still in progress. During this winter season, the private outdoor swimming pools are naturally closed and will reopen in warmer weather. The sauna and relax area are scheduled to be completed soon.
offer_notice_desc: Prices shown below are introductory and subject to revision as the resort transitions from opening phase to full operations. Rates may be adjusted based on demand, availability, and completion of remaining works.
chalets_desc: Our chalets combine nature and luxury, created for those seeking tranquility, comfort, and a unique escape. Each chalet has its own story, designed to awaken emotion and bring complete relaxation.
wind_desc: The Wind chalet carries the freshness of the mountain breeze and the feeling of freedom in every breath. Perfect for those who wish to feel the rhythm of nature and the harmony between wind and trees.
summit_desc: The Sun chalet glows with golden light, perfect for mornings filled with warmth and energy. Every ray of sunshine brings joy and reminds you that each day is a new beginning.
star_desc: The Star chalet lies beneath a sky full of stars, where nights turn into magical moments. It’s ideal for couples or anyone wishing to find calmness under the endless sparkle of the night sky.
cloud_desc: The Cloud chalet floats above the clouds, surrounded by silence and a view that connects sky and earth. It’s made for those who seek inspiration and peace in moments of pure stillness.
sky_desc: The Sky chalet stands at the boundary where the world fades and the heavens begin, offering boundless horizons and a sense of absolute freedom. It is the perfect vantage point for seekers of clarity, allowing you to breathe in the vastness and connect with the world's grand scale.
location_description: Mrakovica, Kozara National Park • 45 mins from Banja Luka
location_hint: Or find us on the map below
about_us_desc1: Kozara Panoramic Resort was created out of love for nature and the idea that luxury and peace can exist in perfect harmony. Our mission is to create a place where every guest feels a deep balance between nature, comfort, and serenity. Nestled in the heart of Mount Kozara, the resort offers an unforgettable experience where every detail reflects warmth, care, and elegance.
about_us_desc2: Our modern cabins offer privacy and intimacy, while still providing all the amenities of contemporary accommodation. Panoramic views, pure mountain air, and forest silence make every morning special and every evening calm. Kozara Panoramic Resort is more than a place to stay – it’s an experience that restores inner balance, reconnects you with nature, and reminds you how little is needed to feel true peace. Welcome to a space where time slows down and every moment becomes a lasting memory.
about_kozara_desc1: Mount Kozara, known as the “air spa” and the green jewel of Krajina, is a place where nature still breathes freely. Its dense forests, pure air, and peaceful viewpoints offer the perfect escape from city life. Kozara blends wilderness and tranquility, creating an ideal setting for relaxation, adventure, and self-discovery. Mount Kozara, known as the air spa and green oasis of Western Krajina, is where nature reveals its true beauty. Its dense forests, mountain streams, and fresh air make it a perfect retreat for rest, adventure, and spiritual renewal. The mountain trails lead through scenic viewpoints and fragrant meadows, offering views that calm the soul and fill you with energy.
about_kozara_desc2: Kozara is more than a mountain – it’s an experience of connection with nature, a place where time slows down and thoughts become clear. Every visitor finds their moment of peace here, whether in the quiet of the forest, the whisper of the wind, or the sunset that paints the peaks in golden tones. Kozara invites you to pause, breathe deeply, and feel what true freedom means.
closing_desc: Book your stay today and discover the magic of Mount Kozara.
booking_form_occupants_note: Up to 6 Adults, or 4 Adults and 2 Children
faq_heating_q: Are the chalets heated and air-conditioned?
faq_heating_a: Yes. All chalets feature fully automated air conditioning and heating for year-round comfort, including underfloor heating in the living area, dining area, kitchen, and bathroom.
faq_kitchen_q: What is included in the kitchen?
faq_kitchen_a: The kitchens are fully equipped for self-catering. Features include a hob, large oven, microwave, large fridge-freezer, dishwasher, cookware, dishes, and glassware.
faq_linens_q: Do I need to bring linens or towels?
faq_linens_a: No. Bed linens and 100% cotton towels are provided. Bathrobes and swimming pool towels are available upon request.
faq_wifi_a: Yes, Wi-Fi access is provided. The network name and password will be given to you at check-in.
faq_pool_heating_q: Are the pools private and heated?
faq_pool_heating_a: Yes, each chalet has its private pool (seasonal opening times).
faq_lifeguard_q: Is there a lifeguard at the pool?
faq_lifeguard_a: No. Pool use is entirely at your own risk. Parents must supervise children at all times. Please note that only plastic glasses are allowed in the pool area.
faq_checkin_q: What are the check-in and check-out times?
faq_checkin_a:
Check-in: 14:00 – 22:00.
Check-out: By 09:00.
Note: Early check-in or late check-out may be possible depending on availability; please contact reception in advance.
faq_deposit_a: Yes. A €250 credit card deposit is pre-authorized at check-in. This is a temporary hold to cover damages or unpaid extras and is released a few days after check-out if no issues are reported.
faq_cancel_a:
Standard Season (April–June, Mid-Sept–Oct): 25% refund >14 days before arrival; 50% refund 7–13 days before. No refund if <7 days.
Peak Season (July, August, Holidays): No cancellations or refund available
faq_payment_a: We accept Visa, Mastercard, and American Express. Tourist tax is added to the booking. Extras can be paid by cash or card at check-out.
faq_tax_a:
Yes, a tourist tax is charged per person, per night. The rates are as follows:
Adults: €1.30 per night.
Children (12 to 18 years): €0.80 per night.
Children (under 12 years): Free of charge.
faq_shops_q: Where are the nearest shops and restaurants?
faq_shops_a:
Turjak (approx. 4 km): Nearest grocery store, restaurants, and cafés.
Gradiška (approx. 20 km): Larger supermarkets, pharmacies, and main highway connections.
faq_housekeeping_a: Could be provided for stays longer than 7 days.
faq_baby_a: No. We do not provide baby cots or highchairs, so we strongly advise parents to bring their own equipment for their children.
faq_pets_a: Yes, pets are allowed upon request. Please note there is an additional fee of €15 per stay.
faq_parking_a: Yes, there is free private parking directly next to each chalet.
faq_ev_q: Do you have an EV charging station?
faq_ev_a: Not currently, though one is planned for the future. The nearest petrol station is on the main road to Gradiška (approx. 18 km).
faq_quiet_a: Quiet hours are from 22:00 to 08:00. (Exceptions may be made if one group has booked all 5 chalets).
faq_airport_a: Banja Luka airport is approximately 45 minutes by car. Transfers and local taxi services can be arranged upon request.
faq_yearround_q: Is the resort open all year-round?
faq_find_q: How do I find the Resort?
faq_find_a: Please follow our sign posts for Kozara Panoramic Resort.
